title: What are 'The arts and the humanities'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Arguable because it's difficult to distinguish between those and the social sciences, but if you want to speak in the context of college majors, it's things like foreign languages and literatures, English, film theory and production, studio and dramatic art, art history, and music. You could exclude history/anthropology/philosophy depending on who you are, but political science, economics, math, physics, engineering, and psychology would almost definitely not be considered "arts and the humanities."
